amendment.description: To set aside an amount for F-16 Theater Airborne Reconnaissance System upgrades.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3540 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3540 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S7381-7382; text: CR S7381-7382) To set aside an amount for F-16 Theater Airborne Reconnaissance System upgrades.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3540 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3540 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Conrad.
